description: Early mechanical calculating devices like the abacus, Pascaline, and Babbage's Analytical Engine.
A visual representation of the evolution of computer components, showing a vacuum tube, a transistor, an integrated circuit, and a microprocessor.
An iconic image of an early personal computer, such as an Apple II or an original IBM PC.
A conceptual image representing the global reach of the internet, perhaps a network of interconnected lines over a world map.
A line graph showing the exponential growth of internet users worldwide from 1995 to 2023. The X-axis should be "Year" and the Y-axis should be "Number of Internet Users (in billions)".
